summary: The year is 2000 and investors are going crazy about a new mobile phone company called Riot Entertainment. Many high profile companies, like Nokia, invest millions on this unknown firm. Two... See full summary »
cast: Richard Stanley|Ninja Burgess|David Bowes|Rod Britton|Rico Camus|Steven Frank|Al Giebel|John Hakalax|Jani Halme|Johanna Hytönen|Vesa-Pekka Kirsi|Petri Kuittinen|Panu Laaksonen|Pasi Marjanen|Hanna Marttinen-Deakins|Jouni Miikki|Aku Mutanen|Michaela Nyman|Antti Svenn|Jean-Bernard Tellio|Sonny Thakur|Jan Wellmann|Hoic Cari|Zhort Zhit|Minna Sara|Sirkka Kivi|Anni Vuorimaa|Mikko Manni|Piia Manninen|Ukko Laakso|Mirella|Janonen|Dole|Juha Aarikka|Jussi Arhinmäki|Olli Paavolainen|Perttu Salo|Aki Sundell|Kerkko Kuha|Marko Harapainen|Matti Räsänen|Olli Rinne|Jucci Hellström|Ile Mr. Irmeli|Johkulainen|Khäertta|Mad Max
title: Riot On!
